trends: There has been one other sighting in Colonie
There were no other sightings in Colonie on or around May 15th 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was working at a car dealership and went outside the garage area to have a smoke. I was feeling spaced out and paranoid that day, which might have been due to having a nephrite jade bracelet on. The reason I went outside was to recollect myself from the spaciness I was having. Then I looked up and this thing was there right over my head with some writing on it. I forget what the writing was. It wasn't much higher than the garage building which was a typical steel warehouse style building. I want to say this was the ceiling fan UFO. I'm not sure if I had heard about the ceiling fan UFO before or after this encounter though. When I first saw it I felt it was military. The way it made me feel: That "they" know who I am and what I've been up to. I looked around to see if anyone else had seen it but no one was there. Then it was gone next time I looked. It was around this time that I started to have had a lot of ringing in my ears and also deja vu.
Summary: Spaced out feeling and then I see it over my head.
